languages.text: "Моя бабушка ходила сюда каждый день и каждый раз брала новый талон, но не использовала его. Один из них достался мне в наследство — храни бабулину душу Бог-Император!"

traits.locale_text: "Моя бабушка ходила сюда каждый день и каждый раз брала новый талон, но не использовала его. Один из них достался мне в наследство — храни бабулину душу Бог-Император!"

languages.text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"
languages.original_text: "Моя бабушка ходила сюда каждый день и каждый раз брала новый талон, но не использовала его. Один из них достался мне в наследство — храни бабулину душу Бог-Император!"

traits.locale_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"
"My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"
"My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"
"My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

languages.text: “我奶奶以前每天都会来这里，每天都会拿一张新的叫号票，但那些票她一张都没用过。我从她的遗产中继承了一张叫号票，愿神皇保佑她的灵魂！”
languages.original_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

traits.locale_text: “我奶奶以前每天都会来这里，每天都会拿一张新的叫号票，但那些票她一张都没用过。我从她的遗产中继承了一张叫号票，愿神皇保佑她的灵魂！”

languages.text: «Mi abuela venía aquí todos los días y siempre cogía un número nuevo, pero nunca le llegaba el turno. Heredé uno de ellos; ¡que el Dios Emperador guarde su alma!».
languages.original_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi abuela venía aquí todos los días y siempre cogía un número nuevo, pero nunca le llegaba el turno. Heredé uno de ellos; ¡que el Dios Emperador guarde su alma!».

languages.text: 「祖母は毎日ここに通い、毎日新しい番号札をもらっていましたが、一枚も使うことはありませんでした。私はこの札の1枚を相続したのです。神帝陛下は祖母の魂を見守ってくださっています！」
languages.original_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「祖母は毎日ここに通い、毎日新しい番号札をもらっていましたが、一枚も使うことはありませんでした。私はこの札の1枚を相続したのです。神帝陛下は祖母の魂を見守ってくださっています！」

languages.text: « Ma grand-mère venait ici tous les jours et à chaque fois, elle prenait un nouveau ticket, mais elle n'a jamais eu l'occasion de les utiliser. Résultat, c'est moi qui en ai hérité, l'Empereur-Dieu garde son âme ! »
languages.original_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

traits.locale_text: « Ma grand-mère venait ici tous les jours et à chaque fois, elle prenait un nouveau ticket, mais elle n'a jamais eu l'occasion de les utiliser. Résultat, c'est moi qui en ai hérité, l'Empereur-Dieu garde son âme ! »

languages.text: "Meine Großmutter kam jeden Tag her und hat eine neue Nummer gezogen, sie aber nie benutzt. Eine dieser Nummern habe ich nun geerbt. Der Gottimperator wache über ihre Seele!"
languages.original_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Meine Großmutter kam jeden Tag her und hat eine neue Nummer gezogen, sie aber nie benutzt. Eine dieser Nummern habe ich nun geerbt. Der Gottimperator wache über ihre Seele!"

languages.text: "Ninem, her gün buraya gelip yeni bir fiş alırdı ama hiçbirini de kullanmazdı. O fişlerden biri de bana miras kaldı. Tanrı İmparator ninemin ruhunu korusun!"
languages.original_text: "My grandma came here every day and every day she took a new ticket, but she never used any of them. I inherited one of those tickets, God-Emperor watch over her soul!"

traits.locale_text: "Ninem, her gün buraya gelip yeni bir fiş alırdı ama hiçbirini de kullanmazdı. O fişlerden biri de bana miras kaldı; Tanrı İmparator ninemin ruhunu korusun!"
